directions: In a large bowl, toss together the cabbage, 1 tablespoon of reserved orange juice, salt, ginger, nutmeg, and pepper.
Toss the oranges and pineapple into the mixture. Stir in mayonnaise until evenly coated.  Chill well before serving.
ingredients: 1 (11 ounce) can mandarin oranges, drained and liquid reserved
title: Hawaiian Coleslaw
